title: Red
provenance_text:
Sam Francis [1923-1994], Paris, France [1]; Martha Jackson Gallery, New York, NY [2]; purchased by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1958 [3].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was exhibited (no. 160) in "The 1958 Pittsburgh Bicentennial International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, December 1958 - February 1959. It was purchased by the museum from this exhibition.
[2]. This New York gallery represented the artist, who was living in France during this period.
[3]. The museum accessioned the painting on November 21, 1958; payment to the Martha Jackson Gallery was sent on January 13, 1959.

creator.birth_place: San Mateo (San Mateo county, California, United States)
creator.death_place: Santa Monica (Los Angeles county, California, United States)
